Description: TapStack - Production-grade secure multi-tier VPC infrastructure for us-east-1

ProjectName.Description: Name of the project for resource tagging and naming

PublicSubnetCidrs.Description: CIDR blocks for public subnets (must be within VPC CIDR)

PrivateSubnetCidrs.Description: CIDR blocks for private subnets (must be within VPC CIDR)

AllowedSshCidr.Description: CIDR allowed to SSH to bastion (set to YOUR_PUBLIC_IP/32)
AllowedSshCidr.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IPv4 CIDR (e.g., 198.51.100.7/32)

EbsCleanupRetentionHours.Description: Hours after which unattached EBS volumes can be deleted (1-8760)

EbsCleanupRequireTag.Description: Whether to require AutoDelete=true tag for EBS cleanup

Description.Fn::Sub: KMS key for ${ProjectName} S3 encryption and CloudTrail

Properties.Description: Policy for accessing app data bucket and KMS key
Policy that denies sensitive console/API actions without MFA
Policy for Lambda EBS cleanup function

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for VPC interface endpoints

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash
yum update -y
yum install -y amazon-ssm-agent
systemctl enable amazon-ssm-agent
systemctl start amazon-ssm-agent
sed -i 's/#PasswordAuthentication yes/PasswordAuthentication no/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sed -i 's/#PubkeyAuthentication yes/PubkeyAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
systemctl restart sshd
yum install -y amazon-cloudwatch-agent

Fn::Base64.Fn::Sub:
#!/bin/bash
yum update -y
yum install -y amazon-ssm-agent amazon-cloudwatch-agent
systemctl enable amazon-ssm-agent
systemctl start amazon-ssm-agent
curl "https://awscli.amazonaws.com/awscli-exe-linux-x86_64.zip" -o "awscliv2.zip"
unzip -q awscliv2.zip
./aws/install
aws s3 ls s3://${S3AppBucket} || echo "S3 access test failed"

Properties.Description: Daily trigger for EBS cleanup Lambda

S3AppBucketName.Description: Name of the application data S3 bucket

S3LogsBucketName.Description: Name of the logs S3 bucket

KmsAliasName.Description: Alias name of the KMS key

BastionInstanceId.Description: Instance ID of the bastion host

BastionPublicIp.Description: Public IP address of the bastion host

PrivateInstanceProfileName.Description: Name of the private instance profile

PrivateInstanceRoleName.Description: Name of the private instance role

EbsCleanupLambdaArn.Description: ARN of the EBS cleanup Lambda function

EbsCleanupRuleName.Description: Name of the EBS cleanup EventBridge rule

BastionSecurityGroupId.Description: ID of the bastion security group

PrivateSecurityGroupId.Description: ID of the private security group

ConsoleUsersGroupName.Description: Name of the console users group with MFA enforcement
